<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Ticket prices increase on July 1
Don’t miss key talks <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/sessions]]> from the leading Spring and Cloud Foundry committers above as they showcase how to transform current IT practices, roles, and responsibilities using Cloud Native applications. Network with top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2016. Save $150.00 by registering now <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> and don’t forget to book your hotel <[[https://aws.passkey.com/event/14801722/owner/1464789/home]]> at the best tech hotel in Vegas!
Pre-conference training July 31—Aug 1st
Pivotal Education offers a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne conference. Training ticket prices increase on July 1, so register now for these in-depth trainings on the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies and save. Check out the new Spring Cloud Data Flow training!
